action.action-desc: Mr. Norcross introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to furnish headstones and markers for the graves of dependents of veterans buried in county, private, or other cemeteries.

section.header: Department of Veterans Affairs furnished headstones and markers for graves of veterans’ spouses

subsection.text: Section 2306 of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (2), by striking section 2402(a)(4), (5), and (6) and inserting section 2402(a)(4) and (6); and

in paragraph (4), by striking section 2402(a)(5) and all that follows through the period and inserting the following: paragraph (5) or (9) of section 2402(a) of this title who is buried in any cemetery in the United States.; and
in paragraph (1), by inserting , (4), after paragraph (2); and
in paragraph (4), by inserting , or as a dependent of a veteran after status as a veteran.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall apply with respect to deaths occurring on or after November 11, 1998.
